long_desc: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants.
flags_raw: Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite
stats1_raw: an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing
stats2_raw: embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow.
stats3_raw: The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.
